settings.text: STITCHED ORDERS ONLY ENTERTAINED ON PRE-PAYMENT

settings.code:
‚èæ Eid Ul Fitr Dispatch Timeline

üìå Stitched orders placed after 15th March (Local) and 10th March (International) will be processed and delivered after Eid.

üì¶ Unstitched Dispatch: 24th March (Local), 18th March (International).

settings.title: PRODUCT NOTE
settings.content:
• Actual color may slightly vary from the image shown.
  • Unstitched includes fabric for Shirt, Dupatta and Trouser ONLY. Lining fabric is separate and is subjected to be charged.
  • Stitched includes Shirt, Lining, Dupatta and Trouser all embellished as shown in pictures.
  • Standard Stitched will not have the shoulder cutlines, Lining will be full from shoulders (no straps). If there is any Choli design it will be full length covering skin from belly. Cancan is not provided in any of the articles.
  • Any changes from standard stitched eg Lining in the Sleeves will fall in customized stitching and subject to extra charges PKR 2000.
  • Any changes to the suit including size, style, custom measurements can only be made within 24 hours after the order was placed

settings.title: Shipping information
settings.content:
Standard delivery times for orders to Pakistan are as follows:

  • Unstitched Orders: 2-4 business days
  • Stitched Orders: 15-18 business days
  • Ready-to-Wear (RTW) Orders: 2-4 business days
  • Express stitching: 5-7 business days
  • Customized stitching: Additional 1 week

For International orders, the standard delivery times are:

  • Unstitched Orders: 5-7 business days
  • Stitched Orders: 18-21 business days
  • Ready-to-Wear (RTW) Orders: 5-7 business days
  • Express stitching: 7-10 business days
  • Customized stitching: Additional 1 week
